Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupproject.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class for handling external data files in csv format

    • Method Detail

      • getAnimations

        public Triplet<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean>[] getAnimations(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the animation set for a named animation
        Parameters:
        name - name of animation corresponding to row name in animations.csv
        Returns:
        Triplet array containing (sprite position, duration in frames, flip)

      • getEnemies

        public Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>[] getEnemies(int column,
                                                             int ignoreBoss)
        Gets the list of enemies as a Pair array
        Parameters:
        column - which column number to get the data from
        ignoreBoss - how many bosses to ignore
        Returns:
        Pair array containing (enemy name, data from column)

      • getItems

        public java.lang.String[] getItems()
        Gets the item list from items.csv
        Returns:
        String array containing all droppable item names

      • savePassives

        public void savePassives(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>[] passives)
        Saves the player's current passives into passives.csv updating the count column
        Parameters:
        passives - ArrayList array containing all rows for the passive data

      • readFromFile

        public void readFromFile(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String filePath)
        Loads data from a file at filepath and stores it in a HashMap by name. Only call this method once per file
        Parameters:
        name - Name to associate with data
        filePath - Filepath to get data from

      • getData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getData(java.lang.String name)
        Gets all the data from a specific file
        Parameters:
        name - Name that was used when the file was loaded
        Returns:
        Array list containing all the data from file

      • getRowData

        public java.lang.String[] getRowData(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String rowName)
        Gets the all the data from a specific row from a specific file
        Parameters:
        name - Name that was used when the file was loaded
        rowName - Name of the row in the file
        Returns:
        String array of row data

      • getSpecificData

        public java.lang.String getSpecificData(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String rowName,
                                        java.lang.String columnName)
        Gets a specific cell of data from a file
        Parameters:
        name - Name that was used when the file was loaded
        rowName - Name of the row in the file
        columnName - Name of the column in the file
        Returns:
        String containing row data

      • isDataLoaded

        public boolean isDataLoaded(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if there is a file loaded with a given name
        Parameters:
        name - Name that was used when the file was loaded
        Returns:
        true if key matches, false otherwise
